item.title:
RT by @lxjhk: Solana 2.2 crates are out. Now you can use SDK types without depending on the whole SDK.
This is a cataclysmic event for dependency trees. Mass deforestation imminent. Compile times to be reduced by orders of magnitude.
There will be real semver too
item.dc:creator: @dj_d_sol
item.description:
Solana 2.2 crates are out. Now you can use SDK types without depending on the whole SDK.

This is a cataclysmic event for dependency trees. Mass deforestation imminent. Compile times to be reduced by orders of magnitude.

There will be real semver too

item.title:

The monopolies in the military, healthcare, and even the chip industry are troubling examples.
